newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Cabletron cut by Salomon.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Cabletron cut by Salomon.

text.p: Salomon Brothers said it downgraded Cabletron Systems Inc to hold from buy and removed the stock from its "Recommended List."
-- Cabletron Systems said on Monday that it expects to report first-quarter earnings per share of about $0.37, compared with the First Call consensus estimate of $0.50 per share.
-- Salomon said it trimmed fiscal 1998 earnings estimates to $1.75 a share from $2.22 a share. Trimmed the 1998 revenue estimate to $1.56 billion from $1.8 billion.
-- Salomon said cut the fiscal 1999 estimate to $2.30 a share from $2.75 a share. Cut the 1999 revenue estimate to $2.0 billion from $2.3 billion.
-- Cabletron lost 15 to 30-3/4 in exchange trading.
